questions: Does this landing page feature a clean and modern design? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a hero section on this landing page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the hero section showcase an image of the shampoo bottle? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a catchy headline that says 'Transform Your Hair Today'? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The landing page has a minimalistic layout with ample white space and contemporary color accents.
yes There is a prominent top section with a large image and key message which constitutes a hero section.
yes The hero section includes an image of a hair care product, likely to be a shampoo bottle.
no The headline visible does not match exactly with 'Transform Your Hair Today'.
yes There is a prominent call-to-action button depicted, though the exact text may vary from 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'.
yes The text is sufficiently clear and legible for easy reading.
